import React from 'react'; import '../styles/userUploadBook.css'; import '../styles/bootstrap.min.css'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'unistore/react' import { actions, store } from '../store' const allGenres = ['Romantis','Sejarah','Teenlit','Drama','Fantasi','Chicklit','Komedi','Misteri','Songlit','Thriller','Fan-Fiction','Dewasa','Horor','Petualangan','Metropop'] class UserUpload extends React.Component { // Function for uploading book by user doAddBook = async () => { await this.props.postBook() if (store.getState().validasiPostBuku){ this.props.history.push("/profile"); } } render() { return (
